channel.title: home decor on Debashish Sahu
channel.description: Recent content in home decor on Debashish Sahu

item.title: DIY Custom Holiday Gift | Wood Decor | 3D Printed Letters | Photo Hanger
item.description: Check out Canvasyvibes Art on the inspiration for this project. I use a stained cedar picket fence, 3D printed letters and photo clip to create a personalized holiday gift.

item.title: Ultimate guide to permanent holiday lights using NeoPixels/WS2812B LEDs
item.description: Permanent holiday lights hardware and software setup using NeoPixels/WS2812B LEDs Hardware LEDs: https://amzn.to/2Lu4m3P Aluminum Channels: https://amzn.to/2Knajio 18/2 wire: https://amzn.to/348I1zq 18/3 wire: https://amzn.to/37YNCJM Control Box: https://amzn.to/2KjfakW 5v 60A Power Supply: https://amzn.to/2KmRHiu 25ft extension cord: https://amzn.to/3840RIS Wire nuts: https://amzn.to/3oO1Vrb BME280(optional): https://amzn.to/3p15pHd PCB: https://github.com/toblum/McLighting/tree/master/documentation/pcb Software WELD - GitHub: Aircoookie/WLED WLED User-mod for BME/P 280:

item.title: Epoxy resin holiday lights/night lamp | DIY resin LED decor | WLED
item.description: Board Prep WLED Software: GitHub: Aircoookie/WLED PCB: https://github.com/toblum/McLighting/tree/master/documentation/pcb

item.title: DIY Smart Deck Lights | ESPHome | Home Assistant controlled
item.description: Building a Home Assistant controlled ESP32 based controller for deck LED lights via ESPHome. Software: ESPHome

item.title: DIY Mud Room Bench | Solid Wood & Power Tools
item.description: Building a wooden bench for our mud-room area using standard lumber 2x2, 1x3, 1x8 from big box store. Initially rendered the design in Fusion360, cut using the dimensions out of the project, using power tools and pocket screws.

item.title: DIY Smart Wooden Faux Beam Pendent Lights | ESPHome | Smart Plant Lights | Home Assistant controlled
item.description: DIY Faux wood-beam lights mode from cedar fence pickets. Light is controlled by Sonoff Mini. Pendent Lights: amazon Software: ESPHome

item.title: DIY Modern Coffee Table | Solid Wood Helix Table
item.description: My very first wood working project. Please leave a comment on how I can improve on this craft.

item.title: Building LED String Using Capacitive Dropper
item.description: Convert a string of filament lights (X-mas decoration lights) into a LED string of lights. Inspired from bigclive’s project
